word: Dreams are the whispers of the soul, guiding us towards our deepest desires.
In dreams, we explore the infinite possibilities of the mind.
A dream is a wish your heart makes while you are sleeping.
Dreams are the stars we follow in the dark, lighting our path to the unknown.
Every great journey begins with a dream that dares to believe in the impossible.
In the quiet of the night, dreams are where the heart speaks its loudest.
Dreams are the bridge between reality and the world of endless possibilities.
